mdRecord.dcterms:description: Rafters and braces framing the attic

Currently houses the Center for Teaching Excellence (2017) -- http://cte.virginia.edu/directions/ ; Designed as a dining hall, but never used for that purpose. First used as the home of the University proctor, Arthur S. Brockenbrough, later as a fencing academy and a student dance hall. -- Wilson, The Campus Guide: University of Virginia, 2012 [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
